Sequence Information.Source: the skin secretions) (hybrid between female Litoria splendida; also male Litoria caerulea
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Caerin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial peptide, that adopts an alpha helical conformation which can disrupt bacterial membranes. Each caerin displays a different antimicrobial specificity (By similarity).

Literature.Title: Host-defence peptide profiles of the skin secretions of interspecific hybrid tree frogs and their parents, female Litoria splendida and male Litoria caerulea.
Literature.Author: Pukala TL, Bertozzi T, Donnellan SC, Bowie JH, Surinya-Johnson KH, Liu Y, Jackway RJ, Doyle JR, Llewellyn LE, Tyler MJ.
